from pyspark import SparkContext
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession, Row
# Create SparkContext
#sc = SparkContext("local", "CSV to RDD")

# Read CSV file into RDD
rdd = sc.textFile("abfss://csvfile@myadls5434.blob.core.windows.net/csv_issue.csv")

# Show RDD elements
#rdd.take(5)

lisn = rdd.collect()
print(lisn)
data_rdd = []
def remove_quote_new(input_string):
    modified_string = input_string[:1] + input_string[1:-1].replace('"', '') + input_string[-1]
    return modified_string
#print(lisn)
for i in lisn:
    new_list = i.split(',')
    #print(no)
    #if re.match(r'^".*"$', no[0]) is not None:
    if new_list[0].startswith('"') and new_list[0].endswith('"'):
        result = remove_quote_new(new_list[0])
    
        new_list[0] = result
        n_str = ','.join(new_list)
        data_rdd.append(n_str)
        
        
    else:
        n_str = ','.join(new_list)
        data_rdd.append(n_str)
        

#print(data_rdd)


header = data_rdd[0]
data = data_rdd[1:]

# Split each line by comma and create Row objects
split_data = [line.split(',') for line in data]
rows = [Row(*line) for line in split_data]

# Create DataFrame with inferred schema
df = spark.createDataFrame(rows, header.split(','))
df = df.withColumn('fees',df.fees.cast('int')).withColumn('age',df.age.cast('int'))
df.printSchema()
df.show()

import time

# Record start time
start_time = time.time()
for _ in range(1000000):
    
    from pyspark import SparkContext
    # Create SparkContext
    #sc = SparkContext("local", "CSV to RDD")

    # Read CSV file into RDD
    rdd = sc.textFile("abfss://csvfile@myadls5434.blob.core.windows.net/csv_issue.csv")
    def rdd_to_df(rdd):
        def replace_quotes(line):
            return line.replace('"', '')
   
    
        # Apply function using map()
        replaced_rdd = rdd.map(replace_quotes)


        # Show transformed RDD elements
        data_rdd = replaced_rdd.collect()





        # Splitting the header and data
        header = data_rdd[0]
        data = data_rdd[1:]

        # Split each line by comma and create Row objects
        split_data = [line.split(',') for line in data]
        rows = [Row(*line) for line in split_data]

        # Create DataFrame with inferred schema
        df = spark.createDataFrame(rows, header.split(','))
        df = df.withColumn('fees',df.fees.cast('int')).withColumn('age',df.age.cast('int'))
        df.printSchema()
        df.show()

end_time = time.time()

# Calculate time taken
elapsed_time = end_time - start_time
print(f"Time taken: {elapsed_time} seconds")
